metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18379 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In the Linux kernel before 4.14, an out of boundary access happened indrivers/nvme/target/fc.c.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
